subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Kikkan Randall held off Finland’s Pirjo Muranen in a photo finish to take silver in the sprint at the Nordic skiing world championships in Liberec, Czech Republic. Randall become the first American woman to win a world or Olympic medal in cross-country skiing.
